1.content:
It was about the middle of the night. It was fairly cold but there was no snow outside. You were on your computer in your room, half asleep. As you got up to turn it off and get some sleep, a loud crash came from outside than nearly made you fall out of your chair.

Quickly running downstairs, you open up the door, you notice a crater in the ground. You rub your eyes a bit. it didn't look like a meteor. You took a closer look.

(Now it's time to decide what the character is. First off, what type of media are they from)
1.title: The oppening

14531.title: Mass Effect Series

choices: There is a knock on the door.
145311.content:
In the front yard crater is a completely nude blue girl with tentacle-like- no way! You quickly realize it is Liara from Mass Effect, being the gamer you are. Recognizing is totally not due to indulging in NSFW internet content. Utterly shocked & a bit concerned to see her here- in reality- unconscious, you ran to pick her up. There is no hesitation, putting one arm under her knees & the other her back you get her inside with great difficulty- not easy to lift a deadweighted woman that's tall.

Don't really have to much upper body strength either.
Kicking the door shut you quickly set her on the couch, slightly panting & very confused. She is breathing, she moves her head just some now & as you laid her down, but how is she real? Liara is completely fictional..
..Not able to resist you run your hand down her shoulder, feeling the bizzare texture of Asarian skin.. Not something you'd ever think would be possible is happening. But only doing this you went to get a blanket for her, atleast wanting to not fall into lustful impulses. After covering the mysteriously unscathed Liara up you would sit down on the stairs with your phone, playing some obscure Battle Royale game.. after some time..
145311.title: Liara T' Soni

1453111.content:
In the time waited for her to wake you were tempted to go take a look at her & perhaps touch her, but kept yourself from doing so. The wind outside gets rough, starting to howl slightly just before she begins waking up.

"Agh- h-" Putting your phone on the stairs you watch as she brings her hand to her heads side, wincing in pain, sitting up slightly. She sees quickly that you are sitting there & that she's nude, the blanket having fallen off her chest, expression appearing puzzled now to you. Staring at her bare upper body in silence for a bit is a bit stimulating for your pervy self.

"Hey.. get me some water, please?" She asked as she laid back on the couch, breathing in deeply & putting her other arm under her breasts, shivering. You go get some in slight concern- both for her well-being & your impulses, seeing blue asari mammaries isn't something that should be real.
Going back in she would be sat now against the cushion, still rubbing her head, eyes closed as if she deals with pain. "Here- Im uh- John- by the way-" Liara took it quickly, chugging it down, gasping after finishing the rather large glass & setting it on the couch cushion.

"Im Liara.. take it.. Im on Earth?"

"Yes, but not from your time.." she gives you a slightly suspicious look, "..Uh- your a game.. character.. here.." Putting it bluntly, your very unsure of how she'll react. Her face shows some hint of anger before she huffed deeply & stood up.
"Show.. me." Stepping back slightly the tall asarian is just over you, flustered at seeing the woman not care about wearing a thing. "Sh-shouldn't you rest-?"

"No.. show me." Adamant about it, you try best to ignore a growing erection as you pull up a Mass Effect series summary on the interwebs.
At first she is in disbelief, sitting back down & watching the video deeply.. you sit next to her & lean in. It's hard to not glance at her breasts, being a pervert. Knowing of the intellectual side of the used-to-be fictional woman.. she believes it, in some pain & more into the video rather than focusing on you. A serious expression soon changed into a shocked one, "John.. I never would've thought this was.. a probability.." she, looking at your eyes intently, goes quiet for a few seconds.

"..I guess.. I'll have to ask to stay with you, if it's.. no burden."

"It'll be my pleasure Liara." She smiles with glee, setting the phone down & bringing her other hand off her head & down to cross under her breasts with her other, pushing them up & together some- she scoots closer to you- letting out a shivered breath then asking-

-

Hot damn is your erection at critical mass! You know the long rod bulges up from your shorts & will stick out sorely when you stand, as does she, Liara knowing to & taking it in a way unknown to you.
1453111.title: A weird night.

info.brief_description: You found your favorite character asleep in your yard. The choice of what to do is yours
info.description:
Inspired by a friend of mine on Deviantart's RP starter,
https://www.deviantart.com/professorsodaman/journal/Fave-Character-Amnesia-RP-75...

You're at home, late at night when you hear a crash outside. Outside happens to be a character from a tv show/movie/comic/any media unconcious in a crater in your yard

What you do is up to you. If you leave them alone, you have less to explain but they are in more danger. If you bring them in, you could get them some warmth but you'd have to explain more to them.

WHat happens from there is completely up to you.

The character can be anyone, a video game character, a cartoon character, an anime character, just about anyone.

Have fun!
info.pretty_title: Favorite Character sleeping in your yard
